sentence: If this outcome comes to fruition, it would all but end the presidential ambitions of Ron DeSantis (R-Fla.) or any other Republican planning on running in 2024 until Trump officially makes his intentions clear that is, whether he plans to run for office again, or plans to put his full weight behind another candidate.
author: Douglas E. Schoen
title: Does Donald Trump still control the GOP?: Three Senate races will give us an answer

author: David Weigel
title: Victories by Mastriano, Budd show potency of Trumps false stolen election claims in GOP
